game.title: The Eternal Amulet's Quest
game.objective: Find, unlock, and defeat the Ancients' Guardian for the amulet
game.description: In this quest, you must explore treacherous ruins, confront mystical guardians, and ultimately claim the amulet. Your reward will be unimaginable power and a legacy that echoes through time.
game.reward: Upon completing the quest, you will obtain the amulet's might and receive an immense wealth along with rare artifacts of ancient origin.

task.objective: Discover the entrance to the ruins, guarded by the Moonstone's whispers
task.description: The entrance lies hidden beneath a moonlit stone in the Whispering Glade. Seek out the signs of the lunar cycle and unravel its mystery.

task.objective: Acquire the key from the guardian, the Serpent of Time
task.description: The key is guarded by an ancient serpent that controls the flow of time. Solve a riddle to unlock its passage.

task.objective: Navigate the traps of the Temporal Crypt
task.description: The Crypt is filled with time-bending illusions and ancient traps. Be cautious and quick in your steps.

task.objective: Battle the Guardian, the Heart of Time
task.description: The final challenge lies ahead - face off against the guardian who guards the heart of the amulet. Your courage will be tested.
